ygData.subject: RE: End of Kiting?
ygData.msgSnippet: Look at this nonsense I pulled of EQVault, of course people are pissed, Verant NEVER tells us when they nerf our abilities...I lost the invis vs undead affect
ygData.messageBody:
Look at this nonsense I pulled of EQVault, of course people are pissed,
Verant NEVER tells us when they nerf our abilities...I lost the invis vs
undead affect of the clouding song and nobody told me until I nearly died
finding out by mistake:


Test Server Comments
Verant President John Smedley sent me the following letter that addresses
the Test Server and the recent number of complaints it has received:

I am somewhat surprised at the number of people that are complaining about
some changes that we have put up recently on the Test Server (namely the DoT
change and the Necro Pet change). Please understand that the Test Server is
just that... a place where we can TEST ideas we have. It absolutely does NOT
mean that the changes seen there will make there way onto the Live Servers.
Sometimes we need to try new things to see what works and what doesn't to
solve particular problems. Brad will cover this topic more in his Producer's
Letter.
John Smedley

-Aurum @ 10:46 AM PT
